item.description:
Explore the world of wisdom from Buddha to Plato in our 8-week course.

Classes meet once a week on Mondays from 7:30pm to 9:15pm. The first class of this comparative eastern and western philosophy course will be offered for free.

Registrations will be accepted before and after the first class so feel free to sit-in, meet the instructor and get to know our approach. The cost is $65 per month and includes Tai Chi classes for free. Reduced tuitions are available so just inquire after the first class if you are interested.

group.name: Practical Philosophy -- Application of Timeless Wisdom

item.name: Philosophy from Plato to Buddha class
